member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop
member.summary: P/Invoke declarations for PDFium native library. Provides managed wrappers for PDFium document and page rendering functions.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the PDFium library. Must be called once before any other PDFium functions.
member.returns: True if initialization succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the PDFium library. Should be called once when the application exits.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.LoadDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from a file.
member.param: Password for encrypted PDFs. Pass null for unencrypted files.
member.returns: A safe handle to the PDF document, or an invalid handle if loading failed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetPageCount(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfDocumentHandle)
member.summary: Gets the number of pages in a PDF document.
member.returns: The number of pages, or 0 if the document is invalid.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.LoadPage(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfDocumentHandle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads a page from a PDF document.
member.returns: A safe handle to the page, or an invalid handle if loading failed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetPageWidth(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle)
member.summary: Gets the width of a page in points (1/72 inch).
member.returns: The page width in points.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetPageHeight(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle)
member.summary: Gets the height of a page in points (1/72 inch).
member.returns: The page height in points.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.CreateBitmap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a bitmap for rendering.
member.param: Width of the bitmap in pixels.
Height of the bitmap in pixels.
True to include an alpha channel; otherwise, false.
member.returns: Handle to the bitmap, or IntPtr.Zero if creation failed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.DestroyBitmap(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Destroys a bitmap and frees its memory.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetBitmapBuffer(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the buffer pointer for a bitmap.
member.returns: Pointer to the bitmap buffer.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetBitmapStride(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the stride (bytes per row) of a bitmap.
member.returns: The bitmap stride in bytes.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.FillBitmap(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Fills a bitmap with a color.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderPageBitmap(System.IntPtr,FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Renders a page to a bitmap.
member.param: Left pixel position of the display area in bitmap coordinates.
Top pixel position of the display area in bitmap coordinates.
Horizontal size (in pixels) for displaying the page.
Vertical size (in pixels) for displaying the page.
Rendering flags (0 for normal rendering with antialiasing).

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.GetLastError
member.summary: Gets the last error code from PDFium.
member.returns: The error code.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags
member.summary: Rendering flags for FPDF_RenderPageBitmap.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.Normal
member.summary: Normal rendering with antialiasing.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.Annotations
member.summary: Set to render annotations.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.LcdText
member.summary: Set to use LCD text optimization.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.NoTextSmooth
member.summary: Disable anti-aliasing on text.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.NoImageSmooth
member.summary: Disable anti-aliasing on images.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.NoPathSmooth
member.summary: Disable anti-aliasing on paths.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.Grayscale
member.summary: Grayscale output.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.LimitImageCache
member.summary: Limit image cache size.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.ForceHalftone
member.summary: Always use halftone for image stretching.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.Printing
member.summary: Render for printing.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.RenderFlags.NoNativeText
member.summary: Disable the native text output available on some platforms.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes
member.summary: PDFium error codes.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Success
member.summary: No error.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown error.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.File
member.summary: File not found or could not be opened.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Format
member.summary: File not in PDF format or corrupted.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Password
member.summary: Password required or incorrect password.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Security
member.summary: Unsupported security scheme.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.PdfiumInterop.ErrorCodes.Page
member.summary: Page not found or content error.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative
member.summary: P/Invoke declarations for QPDF native library. Provides managed wrappers for QPDF document manipulation functions. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the QPDF library. Must be called once before any other QPDF functions.
member.returns: True if initialization succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.CreateJob
member.summary: Creates a new QPDF job handle. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-init
member.returns: A QPDF job handle, or IntPtr.Zero on failure.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.qpdf_cleanup(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Cleans up a QPDF job handle. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-cleanup
member.param: Reference to the QPDF job handle (set to IntPtr.Zero on cleanup).

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ReadDocument(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a PDF document from a file. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-read
member.param: Password for encrypted PDFs. Pass null for unencrypted files.
member.returns: QPDF_SUCCESS (0) on success, or an error code.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.WriteDocument(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the PDF document to a file. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-init-write
member.returns: QPDF_SUCCESS (0) on success, or an error code.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.GetPageCount(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle)
member.summary: Gets the number of pages in a PDF document. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-get-num-pages
member.param: QPDF job handle with a loaded document.
member.returns: The number of pages, or 0 if the document is invalid.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.HasError(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle)
member.summary: Checks if a QPDF job has errors. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-has-error
member.returns: True if the job has errors; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.GetErrorMessage(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle)
member.summary: Gets the error message from a QPDF job. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-get-error
member.returns: The error message, or an empty string if no error.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.TranslateErrorCode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Translates a QPDF error code to a user-friendly message.
member.returns: A descriptive error message.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.AddPages(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.String)
member.summary: Adds pages from one document to another. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#page-operations
member.param: Page range specification (e.g., "1-5" or null for all pages).
member.returns: QPDF_SUCCESS (0) on success, or an error code.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.SetCompressStreams(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets compression for stream data. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-set-compress-streams
member.param: True to enable compression; false to disable.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.SetPreserveUnreferencedObjects(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether to preserve unreferenced objects. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-set-preserve-unreferenced-objects
member.param: True to preserve; false to remove.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.SetLinearization(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets linearization (fast web viewing). See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-set-linearization
member.param: True to enable linearization; false to disable.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.SetObjectStreamMode(FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets object stream mode for compression. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#qpdf-set-object-stream-mode
member.param: Object stream mode (0 = preserve, 1 = disable, 2 = generate).

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes
member.summary: QPDF error codes. See: https://qpdf.readthedocs.io/en/stable/c-api.html#error-codes

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.Success
member.summary: No error - operation completed successfully.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.Internal
member.summary: Internal QPDF error.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.SystemError
member.summary: System error (file I/O, permissions, etc.).

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.FileNotFound
member.summary: File not found or could not be opened.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.InvalidPassword
member.summary: Invalid or missing password for encrypted PDF.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.DamagedPdf
member.summary: PDF file is damaged or corrupted.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.InvalidOperation
member.summary: Invalid operation for current document state.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ErrorCodes.OutOfMemory
member.summary: Out of memory.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ObjectStreamMode
member.summary: Object stream modes for QPDF optimization.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ObjectStreamMode.Preserve
member.summary: Preserve existing object streams.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ObjectStreamMode.Disable
member.summary: Disable object streams.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.QpdfNative.ObjectStreamMode.Generate
member.summary: Generate object streams for compression.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfDocumentHandle
member.summary: Safe handle for PDFium document pointers (FPDF_DOCUMENT). Automatically releases the document when disposed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfDocumentHandle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfDocumentHandle.ReleaseHandle
member.summary: Releases the PDFium document handle by calling FPDF_CloseDocument.
member.returns: True if the handle was released successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle
member.summary: Safe handle for PDFium page pointers (FPDF_PAGE). Automatically releases the page when disposed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafePdfPageHandle.ReleaseHandle
member.summary: Releases the PDFium page handle by calling FPDF_ClosePage.
member.returns: True if the handle was released successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle
member.summary: Safe handle for QPDF job pointers (qpdf_data). Automatically releases the job handle when disposed. Ensures thread-safe cleanup of QPDF resources.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an existing handle.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used by P/Invoke for automatic handle creation.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Interop.SafeQpdfJobHandle.ReleaseHandle
member.summary: Releases the QPDF job handle by calling qpdf_cleanup. This method is thread-safe and idempotent.
member.returns: True if the handle was released successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocumentEditingService
member.summary: Service for PDF document structure manipulation operations using QPDF. Provides merging, splitting, and optimization with progress reporting and cancellation support.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocumentEditingService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocumentEditingService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocxParserService
member.summary: Service for DOCX document parsing using Mammoth.NET library. Implements asynchronous operations with comprehensive error handling and structured logging. Converts DOCX files to clean HTML with embedded images as base64 data URIs.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocxParserService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.DocxParserService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfDocumentService
member.summary: Service for PDF document loading and management operations using PDFium. Implements asynchronous operations with comprehensive error handling and structured logging.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfDocumentService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfDocumentService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfRenderingService
member.summary: Service for rendering PDF pages to PNG streams using PDFium. Implements asynchronous rendering with performance monitoring and comprehensive error handling. Returns cross-platform streams that can be converted to platform-specific image types by the consuming code.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfRenderingService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{FluentPDF.Rendering.Services.PdfRenderingService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Logger for structured logging and performance monitoring.
